body: I dug through the history of UITour. Telemetry reporting was added to Heartbeat in Firefox 46. Any version before that won't have any data in Telemetry. That explains why we can't find any 43 heartbeats in telemetry.
body_text: I dug through the history of UITour. Telemetry reporting was added to Heartbeat in Firefox 46. Any version before that won't have any data in Telemetry. That explains why we can't find any 43 heartbeats in telemetry.
